Baseball
LEAD:
Baseball
Baseball
CINCINNATI (NL) - Recalled Keith Brown, pitcher, from Nashville of the American Association. Optioned Tim Birtsas, pitcher, to Nashville.
METS (NL) - Recalled Kevin Brown, pitcher, from Tidewater of the International League. Optioned Todd Hundley, catcher, to Jackson of the Texas League.
TEXAS (AL) - Activated Jeff Kunkel, shortstop, from the 15-day disabled list. Sent Cecil Espy, outfielder, outright to Oklahoma City of the American Association.
Football
NATIONAL FOOTBALL LEAGUE -Named Reggie Roberts director of information. Promoted Leslie Hammond from public-relations assistant to publications coordinator.
BRITISH COLUMBIA (CFL) - Signed Lorenzo Graham, running back.
CHICAGO (NFC) - Signed Mike Tomczak, quarterback, to a two-year contract.
CINCINNATI (AFC) - Agreed to terms with David Fulcher, safety.
DENVER (AFC) - Waived Chris Allen, defensive lineman.
DETROIT (NFC) - Signed Dan Owens, defensive end, to a three-year contract.
INDIANAPOLIS (AFC) - Signed Tony Walker, linebacker; Ken Clark, running back, and Harvey Wilson, defensive back.
GIANTS (NFC) - Signed Rodney Hampton, running back, and Aaron Emanuel, fullback. Released Scott Underwood, defensive lineman.
JETS (AFC) - Announced the retirement of Joe Kohlbrand, linebacker.
SAN FRANCISCO (NFC) - Signed Anthony Shelton, safety, and Odell Haggins, nose tackle.
TAMPA BAY (NFC) - Announced that Terry Blackmon, defensive back, and Terry Fleming, linebacker, had left camp.
